body: Haven't seen the user spam. Isn't the anti-spam too harsh?
body_html: Haven't seen the user spam. Isn't the anti-spam too harsh?

body:
Having been banned for spam myself in the past, posting the same copy/paste in six different places results in them all being deleted and a 24-hour ban.

While he's gone, somebody should register a username very very similar to his username and use it to say things he would dislike to have confused with him. Same with that AubreyHoff loser. I used to think @Joseph_Goebbels was "the worst part of Ruqqus", but I've found others.

Both are a threat to free discourse, both would have you kneel to their philosophy, and both infest social media.
